title: Visual bug with Arcade Riven

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body:
Not sure how to replicate but sometimes when recalling with Arcade Riven the swords when recalling don't show up but the sparkles do

2/10 recalls this would happen

replies.body: well atleast the swords show up 80% percent of the time. meanwhile foxfire ahri's tails are still bugged.

Hey Charmed by Ahri,

Are you referring to the fire particles missing on her tail? I just loaded her up in game, and if that's what you're referring to, it's definitely something we can fix.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=kkVo8W6N,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-11-02T20:27:03.036+0000)
>
> Hey Charmed by Ahri,
> 
> Are you referring to the fire particles missing on her tail? I just loaded her up in game, and if that's what you're referring to, it's definitely something we can fix.

yes, please do. Much appreciated

On it! 

Thanks for bringing it up! :]

Hey Katey,

Just curious, what are your thoughts or has there been any discussion on updating Ahri's model and the strangeness where her tails connect?

Also, would you guise be interested in seeing a rig I've been working on in my free time? 

I'm experimenting with designing an Ahri rig where her tails all fan out from each other; yet all connect bunched together. Very similar to how the tail on a Vulpix or a Ninetails looks looks for reference. Simplistic and could potentially reduce a lot complexity in her model :)

Hey Swizzle, 

I'm getting an 0/10 repro on this one. What graphic settings are you using?
i ve got the same problem sometimes

When you play her again, would you mind uploading your r3d logs?

**Each file appears like this:** [yyyy-mm-ddT15-40-03] _r3dlog.txt, where yyyy-mm-dd is the date of the match played.

**You can find them here:** C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Game - R3d Logs

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=kkVo8W6N,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2015-11-03T20:47:27.276+0000)
>
> When you play her again, would you mind uploading your r3d logs?
> 
> **Each file appears like this:** [yyyy-mm-ddT15-40-03] _r3dlog.txt, where yyyy-mm-dd is the date of the match played.
> 
> **You can find them here:** C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Game - R3d Logs

if it happens again in a game, i will happily

>

Il run it a few more times and get back to you on this

When you play her again, could you upload r3d logs?

**Each file appears like this:** [yyyy-mm-ddT15-40-03] _r3dlog.txt, where yyyy-mm-dd is the date of the match played.

**You can find them here:** C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Game - R3d Logs
